Name: Desecrators
About the game: Explore procedurally generated alien derelicts in this fast-paced co-op shooter Experience smooth six-degree-of-freedom movement Scavenge various pickups to power up your ship Employ various weapon systems to quickly remove hazards Play online co-op with up to 4 players Explosions - lots of them Escape - your ability to pilot the ship may just come in handy Come visit us at our Discord

Meta Description: Looking for information on Desecrators? Check out the release date (Mar 26, 2021), developer insights from Woodhound, and a complete game summary.
